[
    Declare {
        declares: [
            DeclareItem {
                key: SimpleIdentifier {
                    span: (
                        1,
                        15,
                    ),
                    name: "A",
                },
                value: LiteralString {
                    value: "B",
                },
            },
        ],
        body: [
            Echo {
                values: [
                    LiteralString {
                        value: "Hello, world!",
                    },
                ],
            },
        ],
    },
]
